translation.en: - [crash] - Sorry, guys! I'm still getting used to driving inside a mansion.
translation.zh:
抱歉 伙计们 我还在
习惯如何在庄园里开车

translation.en: And driving.
translation.zh: 边开边习惯

translation.en: Are you guys okay?
translation.zh: 你们没事吧？

translation.en: I'm good. The airbag broke my fall.
translation.zh:
我没事 这个安全气囊
接住了我

translation.en: Darcy, the wagon doesn't have an airbag.
translation.zh: 达茜 马车里没有安全气囊

translation.en: I meant Murray.
translation.zh: 我指的是默里

translation.en: After that collision, I need to make an appointment with my chiropractor...
translation.zh:
那次撞击之后 我需要
预约我的脊椎治疗师

translation.en: and my attorney.
translation.zh: 和我的律师

translation.en: Could have sworn my bedroom was around here somewhere.
translation.zh: 我的卧室哪里可能是被诅咒了

translation.en: Let's ask her for directions.
translation.zh: 我们问问她

translation.en: That's Irona, my maid.
translation.zh: 这是艾洛娜 我的女仆

translation.en: Wow. You are really hot.
translation.zh: 你可真性感

translation.en: My electrostatic super capacitor tends to overheat.
translation.zh:
我的静电式超级电容器
要运转过热了

translation.en: Guess I should have mentioned she's also a robot.
translation.zh:
我应该说过
她也是个机器人

translation.en: I splurged on the supermodel model.
translation.zh: 这个超模模型费了我很大精力

translation.en: I've never uttered these words in my life,
translation.zh: 我这辈子都不会说这些话

translation.en: but money well spent.
translation.zh: 不过这钱花得值

translation.en: This is Murray, my best friend and money manager.
translation.zh: 这是默里 我的死党兼财务经理

translation.en: And this is Darcy, my other best friend. Don't let her see my bank password.
translation.zh:
这是达茜 我的另一位死党
别让她知道我的银行密码

translation.en: We'll talk later.
translation.zh: 我们回头再说

translation.en: Welcome to Richie's bedroom.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到里奇的卧室

translation.en: Wow! This place is awesome!
translation.zh: 这房间太漂亮了

translation.en: I can't believe you live here now. I can't believe you paid for all of this!
translation.zh:
-我真不敢相信你现在住这儿
-我真不敢相信你花钱做了这些

translation.en: Check it out.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧

translation.en: It's got a dollar comforter. You mean down?
translation.zh:
-这是一个美元被子
-你是说花了一美元？

translation.en: No, I mean it's filled with dollars.
translation.zh: 不 我是说被子里填满了美元

translation.en: Master Richie's entire room is automated
translation.zh:
里奇主人的整个房间
都是自动化的

translation.en: and can be controlled by a push of a button on his room remote.
translation.zh:
通过房间遥控器上的一排按钮
进行调控

translation.en: Or roomote. Chuckle. Chuckle.
translation.zh: 或是遥 控 咯咯 嗤嗤

translation.en: Is that an aquarium? Yep! Meet my new pet whales:
translation.zh:
-这是个水族箱？
-没错 来认识一下我的新宠物鲸

translation.en: Dollar, Dollar, and Bill, y'all!
translation.zh: 美元 美金和账单

translation.en: All you need is a bubbling treasure chest.
translation.zh: 你只需一个冒泡的财宝箱

translation.en: Over there.
translation.zh: 就在那里

translation.en: Is that real gold? And on a completely unrelated note, do you have a snorkel?
translation.zh:
那是真金的？问个不搭界的问题
你有潜水装置吗？

translation.en: My name is Richie Rich, and I'm just a normal kid...
translation.zh:
我名叫小富翁里奇
我只是个普普通通的男孩

translation.en: except that I have a trillion dollars.
translation.zh: 除了我有一万亿美元的身家

translation.en: You see, I used all the vegetables I never ate to create a new energy source
translation.zh:
我用所有我从来不吃的蔬菜
发明了一种新型能源

translation.en: - and sold it for a lot of money. - [cha-ching]
translation.zh: 将其出售 挣了大钱

translation.en: Now I live in a huge mansion
translation.zh:
现在我住在一个巨大的庄园里
庄园里有我的私人游乐园

translation.en: with my own amusement park, race car,
translation.zh:
现在我住在一个巨大的庄园里
庄园里有我的私人游乐园 跑车和私人订制的机器人女仆

translation.en: and personal robot maid.
translation.zh:
跑车和私人订制的机器人女仆 我与我的家人以及我在世上
最好的朋友们分享我的财富

translation.en: And I have my family and the best friends in the world to share my fortune with.
translation.zh:
我与我的家人以及我在世上
最好的朋友们分享我的财富

translation.en: My dad, my jealous sister Harper,
translation.zh: 我爸爸和我善妒的姐姐哈珀

translation.en: my money manager Murray, and my money spender Darcy.
translation.zh: 管我钱的默里和花我钱的达茜

translation.en: I guess you could say by not eating my vegetables,
translation.zh: 我猜你会说我通过不吃蔬菜

translation.en: and luckiest kid in the world!
translation.zh:
变成了世界上最富有
最幸运的男孩

translation.en: Gold bar?
translation.zh: 金条？

translation.en: I wanted a candy bar! Stupid machine...
translation.zh:
我想要一根棒棒糖
愚蠢的机器人

translation.en: Richie, I feel like you're throwing money away.
translation.zh:
里奇 我觉得
你太大手大脚了

translation.en: Did get this basketball for free.
translation.zh:
-这个篮球是免费送的
-太好了

translation.en: That's great! When I bought a professional basketball team. Ugh!
translation.zh:
我买下一支职业篮球队时
他们赠送给我的

translation.en: I'm glad we still hang out, even though you're rich now.
translation.zh:
我很高兴即使你发财了
我们还能一起聚会 出来玩

translation.en: Of course! We're best friends. Now, check this out!
translation.zh:
当然 我们是好朋友嘛
现在瞧瞧这个

translation.en: Air ball!
translation.zh: 三不沾 我再也不会投三不沾球了

translation.en: No more air balls for me!
translation.zh: 我再也不会投三不沾球了

translation.en: My engineers invented this never-miss basketball hoop...
translation.zh:
在看过我的跳投之后
我的工程师们发明了 这种零失误篮球筐

translation.en: after seeing my jump shot...
translation.zh: 这种零失误篮球筐

translation.en: Sick!
translation.zh: 真让人难以置信

translation.en: If you think that's cool, you should see the bathrooms.
translation.zh:
要是你觉得这就很酷了
你该再来看看浴室

translation.en: They were able to use the same technology on the toilets!
translation.zh:
那里应用的科技
和篮球框的一样

translation.en: Master Richie, I just received a message from your father.
translation.zh:
里奇主人 我刚收到一条
来自您父亲的信息

translation.en: [father's voice] "Richie, please come into the living room."
translation.zh: “里奇 进客厅来”

translation.en: Irona, I know you have the voice modulation software,
translation.zh:
艾洛娜 我知道
你有音频调制程序

translation.en: but please don't speak in my dad's voice. Totally ruins the magic.
translation.zh:
不过请不要模仿我老爸的声音
这完全毁了你超模的美艳外表

translation.en: Uh, ha-ha... Dad? This isn't our old house.
translation.zh: 爸爸 这里不是我们的旧家

translation.en: You don't have to sleep in the living room or shower in the neighbor's sprinklers.
translation.zh:
你不必睡在客厅或借用
邻居的洒水装置洗澡

translation.en: Richie, I'm a man who doesn't require luxuries
translation.zh:
里奇 我是个要求很低的男人
不要求有床或自来水管这类奢侈品

translation.en: like beds or indoor plumbing.
translation.zh:
里奇 我是个要求很低的男人
不要求有床或自来水管这类奢侈品 能睡在沙发上我就很开心了

translation.en: I can be happy on a couch.
translation.zh: 能睡在沙发上我就很开心了

translation.en: I have to be, since I can't figure out how to get in my bedroom with that high-tech entry system.
translation.zh:
我不得不开心 我搞不懂怎么进入
我那安装了高科技系统的卧室

translation.en: It's just a doorknob.
translation.zh: 那只是个门把手

translation.en: And what's that crazy-looking eye scanner device?
translation.zh:
还有那样子古怪的
瞳孔扫描装置呢？

translation.en: A peephole?
translation.zh: 一个窥视孔？

translation.en: - Oh! - [elevator bell dings] Richie.
translation.zh: 里奇

translation.en: My room looks exactly like the Harvard library.
translation.zh:
我的房间看起来就像是
哈佛大学的图书馆

translation.en: And while I might appreciate having a full-time librarian,
translation.zh:
虽然你请个全职图书馆员来
我很感激你

translation.en: I wish she wouldn't shush me every time I speak.
translation.zh:
但我真希望她不要在我每次
讲话时嘘我

translation.en: I am not even in my room!
translation.zh: 我都没在我的房间里！

translation.en: Harper, I knew how hard you've been working to get in Harvard
translation.zh:
哈珀 我知道为了考进哈佛
你学习得有多刻苦

translation.en: so I thought if I made your dream come true, it'd make you happy!
translation.zh:
所以我想 要是我帮你实现梦想
这会让你开心

translation.en: You don't seem happy.
translation.zh: 你看起来不太开心

translation.en: I want to get into the actual Harvard, not a replica my slacker brother built.
translation.zh:
我想进入的是真正的哈佛大学
而不是我的懒鬼弟弟造的复制品

translation.en: It's not a replica! I bought the actual library building and had it moved here.
translation.zh:
这不是复制品 我买下了
真正的图书馆并搬来了这里

translation.en: Well, most of it...
translation.zh: 大部分搬来了

translation.en: the crane dropped one of the walls,
translation.zh: 吊车路上遗落了一面墙

translation.en: so we had to replace it with plywood and spackle.
translation.zh:
我们不得不用涂好墙粉的
胶合板作为替代

translation.en: Spackle. That's a funny word.
translation.zh: 墙粉 这真是个有趣的词

translation.en: Dad, I can't handle living in this monument
translation.zh:
爸爸 我忍受不了住在这个
纪念里奇走狗屎运

translation.en: to Richie's pathetically lucky success.
translation.zh: 获得可悲成功的纪念馆里

translation.en: You should be happy for your brother.
translation.zh: 你该为你的弟弟高兴

translation.en: Not only did he make a gajillion dollars,
translation.zh: 他不仅挣了数不清的钱

translation.en: but that doodad he invented did something... good for the planet.
translation.zh:
而且他发明的这个小玩意
对地球有着积极意义

translation.en: Eliminated the need for carbon-based fuel.
translation.zh: 消除了对于碳基燃料的需求

translation.en: Yeah, that.
translation.zh: 是的 就是

translation.en: All Richie did was catch lightning in a bottle!
translation.zh: 里奇只是把闪电引入瓶子里

translation.en: Literally! He just crammed a bunch of uneaten vegetables
translation.zh:
从字面来说 他只是把一堆
不吃的蔬菜填进了瓶子里

translation.en: into a bottle that happened to get struck by lightning.
translation.zh:
从字面来说 他只是把一堆
不吃的蔬菜填进了瓶子里 这瓶子碰巧被闪电击中了

translation.en: Are you accusing me of not knowing what I was doing
translation.zh:
你是在指责我在发明
引闪电入蔬菜装置时

translation.en: when I invented my trap-electricity-in-vegetables
translation.zh: 对自己的所做一无所知吗？

translation.en: thingamajig?
translation.zh: 对自己的所做一无所知吗？ 爸爸 你为什么来看我们？

translation.en: Dad. Why did you want to see us?
translation.zh: 爸爸 你为什么来看我们？

translation.en: See you? I don't know.
translation.zh: 看你们？我不知道

translation.en: Oh, wait, yeah, uh...
translation.zh: 哦 是的 我想起来了

translation.en: so I wanted to spend some quality time together.
translation.zh: 因为我想我们好好聚一聚

translation.en: I feel really disconnected here. What if we had a family dinner?
translation.zh:
我觉得这个家里气氛冷淡
我们办个家庭聚餐如何？

translation.en: A family dinner? Why am I being punished?
translation.zh:
家庭聚餐？
为什么惩罚起我来了？

translation.en: Guess what?
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着

translation.en: I hacked into your bank account and had you buy you a vertical wind tunnel.
translation.zh:
我黑了你的银行账户
花你的钱给你买了个垂直风洞

translation.en: BTW, your password was really weak, so I went ahead and changed it for you.
translation.zh:
顺便一提 你的密码弱爆了
所以我替你改了个新的

translation.en: Okay, what's the new one?
translation.zh: 好吧 新密码是多少？

translation.en: For security reasons, I can't tell you.
translation.zh: 出于安全考虑 我不能告诉你

translation.en: Richie, we have a problem. It's your new jet.
translation.zh: 里奇 你的新飞机出问题了

translation.en: Don't tell me there are more engine issues.
translation.zh: 别告诉我又是引擎的问题

translation.en: Apparently, a solid gold jet has trouble staying in the air.
translation.zh:
显然 一个纯金打造的飞机
是无法保持飞在空中的

translation.en: #trillionaireproblems.
translation.zh: 标签“暴发户的毛病”

translation.en: Jet or no jet, we can still skydive with this.
translation.zh:
不管有没有飞机 我们还是
可以用这个玩跳伞的

translation.en: Oh, no! Darcy crashed through the ceiling!
translation.zh: 不 达茜撞穿天花板了

translation.en: It's worse than you think. Right above my room is a gorilla habitat.
translation.zh:
后果比你想的更严重
我的房间正上方是大猩猩之家

translation.en: Of all the days to wear banana lip gloss.
translation.zh: 只有今天涂了香蕉口红

translation.en: You're in good hands, Darcy.
translation.zh: 你就踏实接受治疗吧 达茜

translation.en: I downloaded an entire medical library on Irona's hard drive.
translation.zh:
我往艾洛娜的硬盘上载了
整整一个医疗图书馆的医书

translation.en: Now, she's practically a doctor.
translation.zh: 现在她实际上就是个医生

translation.en: Before I do any more, I will need proof of insurance.
translation.zh:
在我做其他事之前
我需要保险证明

translation.en: Darcy, I feel bad that you blasted through the ceiling into my gorilla habitat...
translation.zh:
达茜 我很抱歉你撞碎了天花板
掉到了我的大猩猩之家

translation.en: and that my ceiling fan was on high.
translation.zh: 而且我的吊扇当时还调在最高档

translation.en: I want to do something to make this up to you.
translation.zh: 我想做些什么来弥补你

translation.en: I have just the thing! A coupon for a free lemonade at Corndog Larry's.
translation.zh:
我刚好有个东西 一张拉里玉米
热狗店的免费柠檬水优惠券

translation.en: How about I score us three passes to a concert of a lifetime?
translation.zh:
不如我给咱们三人一人搞一张
终身制的演唱会通行证

translation.en: Like the one and only U.S. show of Swedish house sensation
translation.zh:
比如说这个在美国进行的
演出 瑞典小屋DJ派对

translation.en: Swedish House Sensation!
translation.zh: 瑞典小屋DJ派对

translation.en: That's awesome!
translation.zh: 这真是太棒了

translation.en: He's the best deejay in the world!
translation.zh: 他是世界上最棒的DJ

translation.en: It hurts to get excited.
translation.zh: 兴奋起来好痛

translation.en: Maybe you didn't hear me. Coupon. Free lemonade.
translation.zh:
也许你没听懂我的话
优惠券 免费柠檬水

translation.en: Free.
translation.zh: 免费的

translation.en: Murray told me you bought the concert tickets
translation.zh:
默里告诉我你买了
这个演唱会的门票

translation.en: and exactly how much they cost.
translation.zh: 和这些票到底有多贵

translation.en: I can't wait for tomorrow night! Me neither!
translation.zh:
-我等不及明晚的到来了
-我也是

translation.en: Now I just have to find something to wear...
translation.zh: 现在我得找些衣服穿上

translation.en: Irona, to the mall.
translation.zh: 艾洛娜 去商场

translation.en: Richie.
translation.zh: 里奇

translation.en: I feel like you, Harp, and I are drifting apart,
translation.zh:
我感觉你 哈珀和我之间
关系正变得疏远

translation.en: so I'm reinstituting an old family tradition.
translation.zh:
所以我要重新建立
家庭老传统

translation.en: Dad, Harp and I are too old to take baths together.
translation.zh:
老爸 哈珀和我已经过了
可以一起洗澡的年纪了

translation.en: Starting tomorrow, I'm bringing back family game night.
translation.zh:
从明天开始 我要重启
家人游戏之夜

translation.en: Tomorrow? I can't! I have plans!
translation.zh: 明天？不行 我明天有事

translation.en: Richie, when we moved here, we agreed.
translation.zh:
里奇 当我们搬到这里时
我们做过约定

translation.en: Your house, my rules.
translation.zh:
你的房子我做主
取消你的计划

translation.en: Please!
translation.zh: 拜托好吗？

translation.en: I'd be willing to revisit the bath thing.
translation.zh: 我很愿意重温家人共浴时光

translation.en: Of all the nights to have a stupid family game night,
translation.zh: 哪天进行家人游戏之夜不行

translation.en: my dad picks the one night I have concert tickets.
translation.zh:
我老爸偏偏选了我买好票准备去看
演唱会那一晚

translation.en: Spending quality time with family
translation.zh:
和家人好好相处一段时光
对于维系亲密的家庭关系

translation.en: is important for maintaining meaningful relationships.
translation.zh: 至关重要

translation.en: You may have a motherboard, but you don't have to act like my mother.
translation.zh:
你也许有块母板
但你不必表现得像我母亲

translation.en: Apologies, Master Richie. Pops be straight trippin', yo.
translation.zh:
抱歉 里奇主人
老爸们一般比较直接呢

translation.en: Hey, Richie.
translation.zh: 嘿 里奇

translation.en: Guess who just beat Murray in a game of HORSE--
translation.zh:
猜猜谁在挑战游戏里
击败了默里？

translation.en: the girl who can't use her extremities!
translation.zh: 一位没法用四肢的女孩

translation.en: Well, I have some bad news about Swedish House Sensation.
translation.zh:
关于瑞典小屋DJ派对
我有些坏消息要告诉你

translation.en: Oh, no. Don't tell me he's not going to perform 'Bout Them Meatballs!
translation.zh:
哦 不 别告诉我他不会
演奏《进击的肉丸》

translation.en: I love that song. The beat makes me move my feet like a wild man.
translation.zh:
我超爱这首歌 那节奏让我
像个疯子一样疯狂舞动

translation.en: The problem is, we can't go to the concert.
translation.zh:
坏消息是我们
不会去看演唱会了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh:
-什么？
-为什么？

translation.en: Why? Do you have plans with some new fancy rich friends?
translation.zh: 你约了某些新土豪朋友？

translation.en: By the way, if they need a money manager, here's my card.
translation.zh:
顺便说一下 要是他们需要
财务管理 这是我的名片

translation.en: I knew once you became rich you wouldn't want to hang out with us anymore.
translation.zh:
我就知道你一发财
就不想和我们一起出去玩了

translation.en: Those gorillas may have broken 84 of my bones,
translation.zh:
那些大猩猩也许折断了
我的八十四根骨头

translation.en: but you broke my heart.
translation.zh: 你却打碎了我的心

translation.en: You didn't let me finish.
translation.zh: 你听我说完

translation.en: I was saying we can't go to the concert...
translation.zh: 我说我们不会去看演唱会

translation.en: because it's gonna be here.
translation.zh: 因为演唱会要在我的房间开

translation.en: It is?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: That's the plan.
translation.zh: 计划是这样的 是我刚刚想出来的

translation.en: That I just came up with.
translation.zh: 是我刚刚想出来的

translation.en: Master Richie, may I have a word?
translation.zh: 里奇主人 我能插一句吗？

translation.en: I do not understand. Are you canceling family game night?
translation.zh:
我不明白 你要取消
家人游戏之夜吗？

translation.en: Nope. I'm going to both.
translation.zh: 不 我要两者兼得 我不认为这是个好主意…

translation.en: I do not think that is a wise--
translation.zh: 我不认为这是个好主意…

translation.en: [ahem] Get yours, son.
translation.zh: 一句话 你就做吧 小子

translation.en: Hello! I am Swedish house sensation
translation.zh: 你好 你好 我是瑞典小屋DJ

translation.en: Swedish House Sensation!
translation.zh: 你好 我是瑞典小屋DJ

translation.en: Whoa! Hello, you fine piece of
translation.zh: 你好 你这块加强版钛合金

translation.en: reinforced titanium alloy.
translation.zh:
你好 你这块加强版钛合金 多光谱光学传感器对你
肯定是小菜一碟

translation.en: You are sure easy on the multispectral optical sensors.
translation.zh:
多光谱光学传感器对你
肯定是小菜一碟 你自己也很漂亮 不过我得说

translation.en: You are "bootiful" yourself,
translation.zh: 你自己也很漂亮 不过我得说

translation.en: but I must say, there is a Mrs. House Sensation.
translation.zh: 你自己也很漂亮 不过我得说 我有太太的

translation.en: So what is having Richie Rich bring me here?
translation.zh:
那么 小富翁里奇为什么
让我到这里来？

translation.en: He was hoping to convince you to move tomorrow's show here.
translation.zh: 他希望说服你明天来这里演出

translation.en: Are you suggesting...
translation.zh: 你是说…

translation.en: Oh, it... it's so hot in zis helmet.
translation.zh: 这头盔里真热

translation.en: You are human?
translation.zh: 你是人类？

translation.en: I am sorry, but moving my concert here is not possible.
translation.zh:
抱歉 但是我不可能把
我的演唱会改到这里

translation.en: Maybe this will change your mind.
translation.zh: 也许这个会让你改变主意

translation.en: I will be here at 7:00.
translation.zh: 我明天七点到

translation.en: But I cannot stay for after-party.
translation.zh: 但我不能参加会后派对

translation.en: If I'm not home in time for family game night,
translation.zh:
要是我不及时回家
参加家人游戏之夜 我老爸会朝我的屁股
来一记飞毛腿

translation.en: my papa will give me a swift kick in ze rumpa!
translation.zh:
我老爸会朝我的屁股
来一记飞毛腿

translation.en: Murray, where's Darcy? I want to say hi before game night.
translation.zh:
默里 达茜呢？我想
在游戏之夜前和她打个招呼

translation.en: Game night? You mean the concert?
translation.zh: 游戏之夜？你是说演唱会？

translation.en: Guys! How do I look?
translation.zh: 伙计们 我看起来怎么样？

translation.en: Oh... my... gauze.
translation.zh: 哦 我的上帝

translation.en: I ordered a custom couture body cast so I wouldn't look like an idiot.
translation.zh:
我订购了一个时装版石膏服
这样我看起来就不像傻瓜了

translation.en: Hope you kept the receipt.
translation.zh: 希望你还保留着收据

translation.en: Master Richie.
translation.zh: 里奇主人

translation.en: 1 minute and 53 seconds until family game night.
translation.zh:
距家人游戏之夜还有
一分五十三秒

translation.en: And about 5 minutes until I put the moves on that amplifier.
translation.zh:
不到五分钟后 我会把
舞曲放到扩音器上

translation.en: Got to get out here...
translation.zh: 我得离开了

translation.en: You know, Murray. It occurs to me.
translation.zh: 默里 我突然想到

translation.en: This concert's gonna add a lot to my electricity bill.
translation.zh: 这场演唱会会让我的电费飞涨

translation.en: You're right. How did I miss that?
translation.zh: 对啊 我怎么没想到？

translation.en: Permission to dock my pay?
translation.zh:
-你要扣我钱？
-别担心这个

translation.en: Don't worry about it.
translation.zh:
-你要扣我钱？
-别担心这个 我有个主意 可以收回部分现金
卖纪念品

translation.en: I have an idea to recoup some cash! Souvenir sales!
translation.zh:
我有个主意 可以收回部分现金
卖纪念品

translation.en: How about you start all the way across the room,
translation.zh: 要不你从这开始 穿过房间

translation.en: then make your way to the other side of the room, avoiding this general vicinity?
translation.zh:
然后到达房间的另一边
别在这边出现

translation.en: Souvenirs! Get your bobbleheads here!
translation.zh: 纪念品 快来买小公仔

translation.en: - [mic feedback] - Hello, Richie Rich's bedroom!
translation.zh: 你好 小富翁里奇的卧室

translation.en: Thanks again, Richie. Even though I can't see you,
translation.zh:
再次感谢 里奇 尽管我看不到你
因为我的脖子转不动

translation.en: because I can't turn my neck.
translation.zh:
尽管我看不到你
因为我的脖子转不动

translation.en: It means a lot having you right by my side.
translation.zh:
有你站在我这边支持我
对我来说真的很重要

translation.en: Yep. Right by your side.
translation.zh: 是的 我站你这边

translation.en: That's where I'll be, all night.
translation.zh: 我一整夜都不会走

translation.en: Richie? Are you still there?
translation.zh: 里奇？你还在吗？

translation.en: [Richie's voice] Of course. I'm right here, Darcy.
translation.zh: 是的 我在这儿 达茜

translation.en: Do you think that amplifier likes long walks on the beach?
translation.zh:
你觉得那个扩音器像不像
沙滩上的小路？

translation.en: Game night! Time for some family bonding!
translation.zh:
游戏之夜
促进家庭和谐的时间到了

translation.en: You're lucky I'm in a rush to get this over with.
translation.zh:
你很幸运我简直等不及
这游戏结束

translation.en: Otherwise I would take the time to strangle you.
translation.zh: 否则 我会花时间掐死你

translation.en: Okay, Harper's in the spirit.
translation.zh: 好吧 哈珀精神满满

translation.en: This is all your fault. I could be out doing something fun with my Friday night,
translation.zh:
这都是你的错 要是你没有
成为大名人里奇先生

translation.en: like studying, if you hadn't become Mr. Rich and Famous.
translation.zh:
我本可以在这个周五晚上做些
有意思的事 比如说学习

translation.en: Okay, for the record, I've been Mr. Rich since I was born.
translation.zh:
好吧 正确地说
我一出生就是里奇先生

translation.en: Until last week, the name was just tragically ironic.
translation.zh:
直到上周之前 这名字
只带有悲剧性的讽刺意味

translation.en: Okay, time to play Duck, Duck, Hippopotamus!
translation.zh:
好了 该玩鸭子 鸭子
河马的游戏了

translation.en: You mean "goose"? I mean hippopotamus.
translation.zh:
-你是说鹅？
-我是说河马

translation.en: I couldn't find a goose costume.
translation.zh: 我找不到鹅的服装

translation.en: - [both] Costume? - Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
-服装？
-服装？

translation.en: I thought the game would be more fun if we all got into parts.
translation.zh:
我以为要是我们分演角色
这个游戏会更有趣

translation.en: Maybe I will take the time to strangle you.
translation.zh: 也许我会花点时间掐死你

translation.en: - [muffled music] - What's that booming noise? Sounds like bass from a concert.
translation.zh:
这个噪音是怎么回事？
听起来像是演唱会上的贝斯声

translation.en: Concert? Ha... who has a concert in their house?
translation.zh: 演唱会？谁会在家开演唱会啊？

translation.en: That's... construction workers I hired to hammer out the spackle.
translation.zh:
那是我雇来
锤平抹墙粉的建筑工

translation.en: [chuckles] Spackle.
translation.zh: 抹墙粉

translation.en: So you guys ready to play?
translation.zh: 你们准备好玩游戏了吗？

translation.en: Not really.
translation.zh: 还没有

translation.en: I'm not feeling too well. I need a bathroom.
translation.zh:
我感觉不太舒服
我要上卫生间

translation.en: For everyone's sake, I'm gonna use the one in the south wing.
translation.zh:
为了大家好 我要去
南翼的那个卫生间

translation.en: Got your text. What's the emergency? Your friend Darcy's very boring.
translation.zh:
-收到你的短信 有什么急事？
-你朋友达茜太无聊了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You called me up here for that?
translation.zh:
你打电话叫我来这儿
就是为了这个？

translation.en: Well, that and Swedish House Sensation keeps asking for you.
translation.zh:
还有瑞典小屋DJ一直在找你 小富翁里奇在屋里吗？
我希望如此 毕竟这是他家

translation.en: Is Richie Rich in ze house? I would hope so, since it is his house.
translation.zh:
小富翁里奇在屋里吗？
我希望如此 毕竟这是他家

translation.en: Of course he's here!
translation.zh: 他当然在 他就在我身边

translation.en: He's right by my side.
translation.zh: 他当然在 他就在我身边 没错 一整晚都在这儿

translation.en: Yep, been here all night.
translation.zh: 没错 一整晚都在这儿 里奇 上来这里 扭一扭

translation.en: Richie! Get up here and shake your rumpa!
translation.zh: 里奇 上来这里 扭一扭

translation.en: This night's been a pain in my rumpa.
translation.zh: 今晚真让我心烦

translation.en: Incoming message from your sister:
translation.zh: 来自你姐姐的信息

translation.en: [in Harper's voice] "Richie, get back here!"
translation.zh: “里奇 快回来”

translation.en: Okay, remember what I said about my dad's voice
translation.zh:
好吧 记得我说过我爸爸的
声音毁了艾洛娜的美艳外表？

translation.en: ruining the magic? It's even more disturbing when you use my sister's.
translation.zh:
当你模仿我姐姐的声音时
就更让人心塞了

translation.en: [all] Richie! Richie! Richie!
translation.zh: 里奇 默里 我需要你替我跳舞

translation.en: Murray! I need you to dance for me!
translation.zh: 默里 我需要你替我跳舞

translation.en: Put on my jacket and this mask and make me look cool.
translation.zh:
穿上我的夹克 戴上这个面具
让“我”看起来很有范儿

translation.en: I can do two of those things.
translation.zh: 这两件事我都能做到 里奇

translation.en: [all] Richie! Richie!
translation.zh: 里奇

translation.en: Richie! Richie! I'm back!
translation.zh:
-里奇！
-我回来了

translation.en: Richie, you're sweating. You must really be sick.
translation.zh:
里奇 你在冒汗
你肯定是病了

translation.en: We should cancel family game night until he's all better.
translation.zh:
在他恢复之前
我们应该取消家人游戏之夜

translation.en: And here's to hoping he doesn't
translation.zh:
那就希望他没有患有
那些终身不愈的

translation.en: have one of those chronic gastrointestinal disorders that last a lifetime.
translation.zh: 慢性肠胃失调病之一

translation.en: Maybe I should take you to your room and put you to bed.
translation.zh:
我该带你回你房间
把你放到你的床上

translation.en: No! I mean...
translation.zh:
不要！ 我是说 因为那个高科技进入系统
和瞳孔扫描仪

translation.en: you wouldn't be able to get in because of that high-tech entry system.
translation.zh:
我是说 因为那个高科技进入系统
和瞳孔扫描仪

translation.en: And the eye scanner device.
translation.zh: 你进不去房间的

translation.en: Yeah, those are tricky.
translation.zh: 是啊 那两个系统很难办

translation.en: All right, game on!
translation.zh: 好了 游戏开始

translation.en: - [elevator bell dings] - Duck... duck...
translation.zh:
-鸭子 鸭子
-喂

translation.en: Hello! Richie?
translation.zh:
-鸭子 鸭子
-喂 里奇？

translation.en: My sister Gerta has same hippopotamus costume.
translation.zh:
我妹妹杰尔塔也有这样
一件河马服

translation.en: - Who is that? - Yeah, who is that?
translation.zh:
-那是谁？
-对啊 那是谁？

translation.en: Gerta's brother?
translation.zh: 杰尔塔的哥哥？

translation.en: What are you doing here? You're supposed to be on stage.
translation.zh:
你在这儿干嘛？
你本该在舞台上的

translation.en: I take bathroom break and toilet chase me here.
translation.zh:
我去上了个厕所
马桶把我追到这里来了

translation.en: Richie, what's going on here? Who's the Swedish guy?
translation.zh:
里奇 怎么回事？
这个瑞典人是谁？

translation.en: Sven. Best meatball chef in the biz.
translation.zh: 斯文 业界做肉丸最棒的大厨

translation.en: He adds a pinch of paprika that really gives a bang to the ball.
translation.zh:
他加一撮辣椒粉
让肉丸有种爆炸般的口感

translation.en: Richie, I'm disappointed in you.
translation.zh: 里奇 你真让我失望

translation.en: Dad, I can explain-- No, there's no excuse for this.
translation.zh:
-爸爸 我可以解释…
-不 别找借口

translation.en: Everyone knows the best meatballs are Italian.
translation.zh:
所有人公认 最棒的肉丸
是意大利肉丸

translation.en: You're right!
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: Sven, we better get you and your paprika out of here.
translation.zh:
斯文 请你带着你的辣椒粉
离开这里

translation.en: Richie! Who is paprika?
translation.zh:
-里奇
-谁是辣椒粉？

translation.en: What is paprika?
translation.zh: 什么是辣椒粉？

translation.en: How's the music playing if you're not even up there?
translation.zh:
要是你不在那儿
音乐要怎么播？ 我是DJ 我只是按按钮
假装在做音乐串烧

translation.en: I am deejay. I just hit button and pretend to do stuff.
translation.zh:
我是DJ 我只是按按钮
假装在做音乐串烧

translation.en: Well, get up there and pretend to do stuff!
translation.zh: 那就上去 假装做音乐

translation.en: Murray?
translation.zh: 默里？

translation.en: Irona, where's Richie?
translation.zh: 艾洛娜 里奇呢？

translation.en: [gasps] Sleep mode.
translation.zh: 睡眠模式

translation.en: I'm here!
translation.zh: 我在这儿

translation.en: Why are you dressed like Gerta House Sensation?
translation.zh: 你怎么穿得像DJ杰尔塔？

translation.en: Good question. I'll go change.
translation.zh: 问得好 我去换衣服

translation.en: Murray, there's something going on with Richie.
translation.zh:
默里 里奇有点问题
我们要去找他

translation.en: We need to find him.
translation.zh:
默里 里奇有点问题
我们要去找他 快来推我

translation.en: Grab the dolly!
translation.zh: 快来推我

translation.en: Are you okay to push me?
translation.zh: 你还能推我吗？

translation.en: I-I think so...
translation.zh: 可以

translation.en: But I do need to make another appointment with my chiropractor.
translation.zh:
不过我真的需要再预约一下
我的脊椎按摩师

translation.en: And my attorney.
translation.zh: 和我的律师

translation.en: No! I can't be on empty!
translation.zh: 不 怎么可能没油了

translation.en: Hello, Hallwayside Assistance?
translation.zh: 你好？走廊边协助？

translation.en: Duck... duck... Duck...
translation.zh: 鸭子 鸭子

translation.en: Hippopotamus!
translation.zh: 河马

translation.en: Why aren't you chasing me?
translation.zh: 你干嘛不追我？

translation.en: - Self-pride. - [elevator bell dings]
translation.zh: 因为我有自尊

translation.en: What are you two doing here?
translation.zh: 你俩在这儿干嘛？

translation.en: Looking for Richie. Hey, so are we!
translation.zh:
-找里奇
-嘿 我们也是

translation.en: Ooh, hide and seek. I'm gonna go hide in my room for the next ten years.
translation.zh:
捉迷藏 我接下来十年
都要藏在我的卧室里

translation.en: Hey, I'm back!
translation.zh: 嘿 我回来了

translation.en: Richie, where have you been? Yeah, where have you been?
translation.zh:
-里奇 你跑哪儿去了？
-是啊 你跑哪儿去了？

translation.en: Uh... sleep mode.
translation.zh: 睡眠模式

translation.en: Dad, Richie was obviously lying and sneaking off to hang with his friends.
translation.zh:
爸爸 里奇显然是在说谎
他要溜出去和他的朋友玩

translation.en: He needs to punished.
translation.zh: 他该受到惩罚

translation.en: And if you need ideas, I have a list.
translation.zh:
要是你不知道怎么惩罚他
我这里有张责罚清单

translation.en: Richie, why'd you ditch me at the concert?
translation.zh: 你干嘛把我丢在演唱会上？

translation.en: Concert? What concert?
translation.zh: 演唱会？什么演唱会？

translation.en: Okay, here's the truth:
translation.zh: 好吧 实话告诉你们

translation.en: I promised I would take you guys to Swedish House Sensation,
translation.zh:
我承诺过要带你们
去看瑞典小屋DJ的演唱会

translation.en: but then my dad insisted on family game night.
translation.zh:
但之后我爸爸坚持要举行
家人游戏之夜

translation.en: I didn't want to let you guys down so I moved the concert here
translation.zh:
我不想让你们失望 于是我把演唱会挪到这里
试图同时出现在两个地方

translation.en: and tried to be in two places at once.
translation.zh:
于是我把演唱会挪到这里
试图同时出现在两个地方

translation.en: Richard Rich.
translation.zh: 小富翁里奇

translation.en: Are you telling me that there are hundreds of strangers at a concert in this house?
translation.zh:
你是说这个房子里有上百个
陌生人在开演唱会？

translation.en: Do you know how much fun Duck, Duck, Hippopotamus would be with that many people?
translation.zh:
知道和这么多人一起玩鸭子
鸭子 河马游戏会是多么有趣吗？

translation.en: Dad! What about Richie's punishment?
translation.zh: 爸爸 给里奇的惩罚呢？

translation.en: How 'bout number 37? It's no food or water.
translation.zh:
第三十七号惩罚怎么样？
不给他食物或水

translation.en: I'm sorry I wasn't honest with you guys.
translation.zh: 抱歉我没有对你们说实话

translation.en: I know you were worried that we wouldn't be friends
translation.zh:
我只是你们担心我有钱了就不会
和你们当朋友了 我不会…

translation.en: - now that I'm rich and I didn't-- - Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh:
我只是你们担心我有钱了就不会
和你们当朋友了 我不会… 随便吧 我们能等到
演唱会过去再谈这事吗？

translation.en: Can we talk about this after the concert?
translation.zh:
随便吧 我们能等到
演唱会过去再谈这事吗？

translation.en: I really don't want to miss 'Bout Them Meatballs.
translation.zh:
我真的不想错过这首
《进击的肉丸》

translation.en: I hate to give you credit, Richie... [shrilly] But this is awesome!
translation.zh:
我讨厌夸奖你 里奇
不过这事你做得很棒

translation.en: - Shh! - I'm allowed to talk at a concert!
translation.zh: 我能在一个演唱会上讲话

translation.en: Tchotchkes! Get your tchotchkes here!
translation.zh:
小玩具
快来买小玩具

translation.en: Check it! I'm breaking out the robot!
translation.zh: 看啊 我要跳机器人舞了

translation.en: Oh, sure. Because all robots move like that. I am out of here.
translation.zh:
当然 因为所有机器人都像
那样移动 我要走了

translation.en: Duck... duck... duck... Duck... Duck... duck...
translation.zh: 鸭子 鸭子

translation.en: Yeah, this turned out great.
translation.zh: 没想到结果还不错

translation.en: Nothing's better than having fun with the people I care about.
translation.zh:
没有什么能比得上和自己
在意的人一起开心更棒了

translation.en: Wait... where's Darcy?
translation.zh: 等等 达茜呢？

translation.en: Guys?
translation.zh: 各位？

translation.en: You forgot someone!
translation.zh: 你们忘了某人

translation.en: Can anyone hear me?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Richie? Is that you?
translation.zh: 里奇？是你吗？
